file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  contact:
    email: support+api+documentation@qovery.com
    name: Qovery Product Team
    url: https://www.qovery.com
  description: |
    - Qovery is the fastest way to deploy your full-stack apps on any Cloud provider.
    - ℹ️ The API is stable and still in development.
  title: Qovery API
  version: 1.0.3
  x-logo:
    url: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Qovery/public-resources/master/qovery_new_logo_white.svg
    altText: Qovery
servers:
- url: https://api.qovery.com
security:
- bearerAuth: []
tags:
- name: Account
- name: Account Info
- name: Admin
- name: Application
- name: Application Actions
- name: Application Configuration
- name: Application Database
- name: Application Deployment Restriction
- name: Application Deployment History
- name: Application Environment Variable
- name: Application Event
- name: Application Logs
- name: Application Main Calls
- name: Application Metrics
- name: Application Secret
- name: Applications
- name: Container
- name: Container Actions
- name: Container Configuration
- name: Container Database
- name: Container Deployment Restriction
- name: Container Deployment History
- name: Container Environment Variable
- name: Container Event
- name: Container Logs
- name: Container Main Calls
- name: Container Metrics
- name: Container Registry
- name: Container Secret
- name: Containers
- name: Backups
- name: Billing
- name: Cloud Provider
- name: Cloud Provider Credentials
- name: Clusters
- name: Custom Domain
- name: Container Custom Domain
- name: Database
- name: Database Actions
- name: Database Application
- name: Database Container
- name: Database Deployment History
- name: Database Event
- name: Database Main Calls
- name: Database Metrics
- name: Databases
- name: Dependency
- name: Container Dependency
- name: Environment
- name: Environment Actions
- name: Environment Deployment History
- name: Environment Deployment Rule
- name: Environment Logs
- name: Environment Main Calls
- name: Environment Secret
- name: Environment Variable
- name: Environments
- name: Git
- name: Github App
- name: Git repositories
- name: Logical Database
- name: Members
- name: Organization
- name: Organization Account Git Repositories
- name: Organization Main Calls
- name: Organization Api Token
- name: Organization Webhook
- name: Project
- name: Project Deployment Rule
- name: Project Environment Variable
- name: Project Main Calls
- name: Project Secret
- name: Projects
- name: Referral & Rewards
- name: Container Registries
- name: User Sign Up
paths:
  /organization:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganization
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationResponseList'
          description: List organizations
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List user organizations
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    post:
      operationId: createOrganization
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
          description: Create organization
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization name is already taken
      summary: Create an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
  /organization/{organizationId}:
    delete:
      description: To delete an organization you must have the admin permission
      operationId: deleteOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    get:
      operationId: getOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
          description: Get organization by ID
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization by ID
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
    put:
      description: To edit an organization you must have the admin permission
      operationId: editOrganization
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationEditRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
          description: Edit an organization
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization name is already taken
      summary: Edit an organization
      tags:
      - Organization Main Calls
  /organization/{organizationId}/apiToken:
    get:
      description: List organization api tokens
      operationId: listOrganizationApiTokens
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationApiTokenResponseList'
          description: List organization api tokens
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization api tokens
      tags:
      - Organization Api Token
    post:
      description: Create an organization api token. You can use the generated token
        to interact in a programmatic way with our API.
      operationId: createOrganizationApiToken
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationApiTokenCreateRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationApiTokenCreate'
          description: Organization api token created
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Organization Api Token name is already taken
      summary: Create an organization api token
      tags:
      - Organization Api Token
  /organization/{organizationId}/apiToken/{apiTokenId}:
    delete:
      description: Delete organization api token
      operationId: deleteOrganizationApiToken
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Organization Api Token ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: apiTokenId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: no content
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete organization api token
      tags:
      - Organization Api Token
  /organization/{organizationId}/member:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationMembers
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/MemberResponseList'
          description: Get members
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization members
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/member/{userId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: User ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: userId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Remove a member
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/inviteMember:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationInvitedMembers
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberResponseList'
          description: Get invited members
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get invited members
      tags:
      - Members
    post:
      operationId: postInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMemberRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMember'
          description: User invited
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: User already invited
      summary: Invite someone in the organization
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/inviteMember/{inviteId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Remove an invited member
      tags:
      - Members
    post:
      operationId: postAcceptInviteMember
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invite ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: inviteId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InviteMember'
          description: User invited
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: User already invited
      summary: Accept Invite in the organization
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/transferOwnership:
    post:
      operationId: postOrganizationTransferOwnership
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/TransferOwnershipRequest'
      responses:
        "204":
          description: no content
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Transfer organization ownership to another user
      tags:
      - Members
  /organization/{organizationId}/currentCost:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationCurrentCost
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationCurrentCost'
          description: Get Cost
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization current cost
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCode:
    post:
      operationId: addCreditCode
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationCreditCodeRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          description: add credit code
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add credit code
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/changePlan:
    post:
      operationId: changePlan
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationChangePlanRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Organization'
          description: plan has been successfully changed
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Change organization plan
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/cluster/{clusterId}/currentCost:
    get:
      description: |
        Get your cluster cost range. We are unable to give a precise cost of your infrastructure at the moment.
        But Qovery guarantees that the cost of your cluster will not exceed the max range.
      operationId: getClusterCurrentCost
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Cluster ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: clusterId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CostRange'
          description: Get cluster cost
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get cluster current cost
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/billingInfo:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationBillingInfo
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfo'
          description: Get Billing Info
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization billing info
      tags:
      - Billing
    put:
      operationId: editOrganizationBillingInfo
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfoRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingInfo'
          description: Edit billing info
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit Organization Billing Info
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/billingStatus:
    get:
      description: "This endpoint returns a \"is_valid\" boolean field reflecting\
        \ the billing status of the organization:\n- If true, the organization billing\
        \ is valid\n- For Startup organization, it returns false if there is at least\
        \ 1 invoice unpaid since 1 week\n- For Community organization, it returns\
        \ false if there is no credit left\n"
      operationId: getOrganizationBillingStatus
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/BillingStatus'
          description: Get Billing Status
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization billing status
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationInvoice
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/InvoiceResponseList'
          description: List Invoices
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization invoices
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice/{invoiceId}:
    get:
      operationId: getOrganizationInvoice
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invoice ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Invoice'
          description: Get Invoice
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get organization invoice
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/invoice/{invoiceId}/download:
    get:
      description: This will return URL of the invoice PDF
      operationId: getOrganizationInvoicePDF
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Invoice ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: invoiceId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Link'
          description: Get invoice PDF
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Get invoice link
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/downloadInvoices:
    post:
      operationId: organizationDownloadAllInvoices
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "202":
          description: You will receive an email containing your invoices
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Download all invoices
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCard:
    get:
      operationId: listOrganizationCreditCards
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCardResponseList'
          description: List cfredit cards
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List organization credit cards
      tags:
      - Billing
    post:
      operationId: addCreditCard
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCardRequest'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/CreditCard'
          description: Add credit card
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add credit card
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/creditCard/{creditCardId}:
    delete:
      operationId: deleteCreditCard
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Credit Card ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: creditCardId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete credit card
      tags:
      - Billing
  /organization/{organizationId}/project:
    get:
      operationId: listProject
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectResponseList'
          description: List projects
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: List projects
      tags:
      - Projects
    post:
      operationId: createProject
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProjectRequest'
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Project'
          description: Create project
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
        "409":
          description: Project name within the organization is already taken
      summary: Create a project
      tags:
      - Projects
  /organization/{organizationId}/project/stats:
    get:
      description: "Returns a list of project ids, and for each its total numberof\
        \ services and environments"
      operationId: getOrganizationProjectStats
      parameters:
      - description: Organization ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: organizationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:

  /project/{projectId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}:

        \ be deleted as well\n"
      operationId: deleteProjectEnvironmentVariable

      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path

    put:
      description: "- You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable\n- For an override, you can't\
        \ edit the key\n- For an alias, you can't edit the value\n- An override can\
        \ only have a scope lower to the variable it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN\
        \ > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)\n"
      operationId: editProjectEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path

        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple

          content:
            application/json:
              schema:

        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found

      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
  /project/{projectId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at project level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at project level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createProjectEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Project ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: projectId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:

            schema:

      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable override at the project level
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable
  /project/{projectId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/alias:
    post:
      description: "- Allows you to add an alias at project level on an existing environment\
        \ variable having higher scope, in order to customize its key.\n- You only\
        \ have to specify a key in the request body\n- The system will create a new\
        \ environment variable at project level with the same value as the one corresponding\

      requestBody:

          content:
            application/json:

          description: Create variable alias

          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable alias at the project level
      tags:
      - Project Environment Variable

      description: "- Add an environment variable to the environment.\n  - If the\
        \ environment variable key already exists, then it will be replaced by the\
        \ new one.\n  - If the environment variable value points toward an existing\
        \ environment variable key, it will be considered as an alias.\n"
      operationId: createEnvironmentEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path

          format: uuid

      responses:

          content:

              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'

        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Add an environment variable to the environment
      tags:
      - Environment Variable
  /environment/{environmentId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}:
    delete:
      description: "- To delete an environment variable you must have the project\
        \ user permission\n- You can't delete a BUILT_IN variable\n- If you delete\
        \ a variable having override or alias, the associated override/alias will\
        \ be deleted as well\n"
      operationId: deleteEnvironmentEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an environment variable from an environment
      tags:
      - Environment Variable
    put:
      description: "- You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable\n- For an override, you can't\
        \ edit the key\n- For an alias, you can't edit the value\n- An override can\
        \ only have a scope lower to the variable it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN\
        \ > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)\n"
      operationId: editEnvironmentEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:

        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Edited the environment variable value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit an environment variable belonging to the environment
      tags:
      - Environment Variable
  /environment/{environmentId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at environment level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at environment level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createEnvironmentEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable override at the environment level
      tags:
      - Environment Variable
  /environment/{environmentId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/alias:
    post:
      description: "- Allows you to add an alias at environment level on an existing\
        \ environment variable having higher scope, in order to customize its key.\n\
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body\n- The system will create\
        \ a new environment variable at environment level with the same value as the\
        \ one corresponding to the variable id in the path\n- The response body will\
        \ contain the newly created variable\n- Information regarding the aliased_variable\
        \ will be exposed in the \"aliased_variable\" field of the newly created variable\n\
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias\n"
      operationId: createEnvironmentEnvironmentVariableAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable alias at the environment level
      tags:
      - Environment Variable

    delete:
      description: "- To delete a secret you must have the project user permission\n\
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN secret\n- If you delete a secret having override\
        \ or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well  operationId:\
        \ deleteEnvironmentSecret\n"
      operationId: deleteEnvironmentSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete a secret from the environment
      tags:
      - Environment Secret
    put:
      description: "- You can't edit a BUILT_IN secret\n- For an override, you can't\
        \ edit the key\n- For an alias, you can't edit the value\n- An override can\
        \ only have a scope lower to the secret it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN\
        \ > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)\n"
      operationId: editEnvironmentSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SecretEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Edited the secret value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit a secret belonging to the environment
      tags:
      - Environment Secret
  /environment/{environmentId}/secret/{secretId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at environment level a secret that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at environment level with the same key as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the overridden_secret will be exposed in the "overridden_secret" field of the newly created secret
      operationId: createEnvironmentSecretOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret override at the environment level
      tags:
      - Environment Secret
  /environment/{environmentId}/secret/{secretId}/alias:
    post:
      description: "- Allows you to add an alias at environment level on an existing\
        \ secret having higher scope, in order to customize its key.\n- You only have\
        \ to specify a key in the request body\n- The system will create a new secret\
        \ at environment level with the same value as the one corresponding to the\
        \ secret id in the path\n- The response body will contain the newly created\
        \ secret\n- Information regarding the aliased_secret will be exposed in the\
        \ \"aliased_secret\" field of the newly created secret\n- Only 1 alias level\
        \ is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias\n"
      operationId: createEnvironmentSecretAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Environment ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: secretId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Key'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret alias at the environment level
      tags:
      - Environment Secret

  /application/{applicationId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}:
    delete:
      description: "- To delete an environment variable from an application you must\
        \ have the project user permission\n- You can't delete a BUILT_IN variable\n\
        - If you delete a variable having override or alias, the associated override/alias\
        \ will be deleted as well\n"
      operationId: deleteApplicationEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an environment variable from an application
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable
    put:
      description: "- You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable\n- For an override, you can't\
        \ edit the key\n- For an alias, you can't edit the value\n- An override can\
        \ only have a scope lower to the variable it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN\
        \ > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION)\n"
      operationId: editApplicationEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false

          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Edited the environment variable value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit an environment variable belonging to the application
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable
  /application/{applicationId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at application level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at application level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createApplicationEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: applicationId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable override at the application level
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable
  /application/{applicationId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/alias:
    post:
      description: "- Allows you to add an alias at application level on an existing\
        \ environment variable having higher scope, in order to customize its key.\n\
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body\n- The system will create\
        \ a new environment variable at application level with the same value as the\
        \ one corresponding to the variable id in the path\n- The response body will\
        \ contain the newly created variable\n- Information regarding the aliased_variable\
        \ will be exposed in the \"aliased_variable\" field of the newly created variable\n\
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias\n"
      operationId: createApplicationEnvironmentVariableAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Application ID
        explode: false

        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid

        style: simple

      requestBody:

          content:
            application/json:

          description: Create variable alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable alias at the application level
      tags:
      - Application Environment Variable

  /container/{containerId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}:
    delete:
      description: "- To delete an environment variable from an container you must\
        \ have the project user permission\n- You can't delete a BUILT_IN variable\n\
        - If you delete a variable having override or alias, the associated override/alias\
        \ will be deleted as well\n"
      operationId: deleteContainerEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      responses:
        "204":
          description: The resource was deleted successfully
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Delete an environment variable from a container
      tags:
      - Container Environment Variable
    put:
      description: "- You can't edit a BUILT_IN variable\n- For an override, you can't\
        \ edit the key\n- For an alias, you can't edit the value\n- An override can\
        \ only have a scope lower to the variable it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN\
        \ > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > CONTAINER)\n"
      operationId: editContainerEnvironmentVariable
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariableEditRequest'
        required: true
      responses:
        "200":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Edited the environment variable value
        "400":
          description: Bad request
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Edit an environment variable belonging to the container
      tags:
      - Container Environment Variable
  /container/{containerId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at container level an environment variable that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new environment variable at container level with the same key as the one corresponding to the variable id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created variable
        - Information regarding the overridden_variable will be exposed in the "overridden_variable" field of the newly created variable
      operationId: createContainerEnvironmentVariableOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Environment Variable ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: environmentVariableId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Value'
      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentVariable'
          description: Create variable override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > CONTAINER
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create an environment variable override at the container level
      tags:
      - Container Environment Variable
  /container/{containerId}/environmentVariable/{environmentVariableId}/alias:
    post:
      description: "- Allows you to add an alias at container level on an existing\
        \ environment variable having higher scope, in order to customize its key.\n\
        - You only have to specify a key in the request body\n- The system will create\
        \ a new environment variable at container level with the same value as the\
        \ one corresponding to the variable id in the path\n- The response body will\
        \ contain the newly created variable\n- Information regarding the aliased_variable\
        \ will be exposed in the \"aliased_variable\" field of the newly created variable\n\
        - Only 1 alias level is allowed. You can't create an alias on an alias\n"
      operationId: createContainerEnvironmentVariableAlias
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false

  /container/{containerId}/secret/{secretId}:

      description: "- To delete a secret you must have the project user permission\n\
        - You can't delete a BUILT_IN secret\n- If you delete a secret having override\
        \ or alias, the associated override/alias will be deleted as well\n"
      operationId: deleteContainerSecret
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId

        schema:

        "403":
          description: Access forbidden

    put:
      description: "- You can't edit a BUILT_IN secret\n- For an override, you can't\
        \ edit the key\n- For an alias, you can't edit the value\n- An override can\
        \ only have a scope lower to the secret it is overriding (hierarchy is BUILT_IN\
        \ > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > CONTAINER)\n"
      operationId: editContainerSecret

  /container/{containerId}/secret/{secretId}/override:
    post:
      description: |
        - Allows you to override at container level a secret that has a higher scope.
        - You only have to specify a value in the request body
        - The system will create a new secret at container level with the same key as the one corresponding to the secret id in the path
        - The response body will contain the newly created secret
        - Information regarding the overridden_secret will be exposed in the "overridden_secret" field of the newly created secret
      operationId: createContainerSecretOverride
      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false
        in: path
        name: containerId
        required: true
        schema:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        style: simple
      - description: Secret ID
        explode: false

      responses:
        "201":
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Secret'
          description: Create secret override
        "400":
          description: Can't create an override on a higher scope. Overrides can only
            be created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN
            > PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret override at the container level
      tags:
      - Container Secret
  /container/{containerId}/secret/{secretId}/alias:
    post:
      description: "- Allows you to add an alias at container level on an existing\
        \ secret having higher scope, in order to customize its key.\n- You only have\
        \ to specify a key in the request body\n- The system will create a new secret\
        \ at container level with the same value as the one corresponding to the secret\
        \ id in the path\n- The response body will contain the newly created secret\n\
        - Information regarding the aliased_secret will be exposed in the \"aliased_secret\"\
        \ field of the newly created secret\n- Only 1 alias level is allowed. You\
        \ can't create an alias on an alias\n"

      parameters:
      - description: Container ID
        explode: false

          content:
            application/json:

          description: Create secret alias
        "400":
          description: Can't create an alias on a higher scope. Aliases can only be
            created from one scope to a lower scope. Scope hierarchy is BUILT_IN >
            PROJECT > ENVIRONMENT > APPLICATION
        "401":
          description: Access token is missing or invalid
        "403":
          description: Access forbidden
        "404":
          description: Resource not found
      summary: Create a secret alias at the container level
      tags:
      - Container Secret

  responses:
    "204":
      description: no content
    "400":
      description: Bad request
    "401":
      description: Access token is missing or invalid
    "403":
      description: Access forbidden
    "404":
      description: Resource not found
    "409":
      description: Conflict
    "204-deletion":
      description: The resource was deleted successfully
  schemas:
    AccountInfo:
      example:
        profile_picture_url: profile_picture_url
        nickname: nickname
        created_at: 2000-01-23T04:56:07.000+00:00
        last_name: last_name
        id: 046b6c7f-0b8a-43b9-b35d-6489e6daee91
        first_name: first_name
      properties:
        id:
          format: uuid
          type: string
        created_at:

          type: string
        nickname:
          type: string
        first_name:
          type: string
        last_name:
          type: string

          type: string
      required:

      type: object
    AccountInfoEditRequest:

        last_name:
          type: string

      type: object

      required:

      - key
      - scope
      type: object
    Application:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Base'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ServiceStorage'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Application_allOf'
    ApplicationAdvancedSettings:
      example:
        deployment.delay_start_time_sec: 0
        liveness_probe.initial_delay_seconds: 2
        liveness_probe.failure_threshold: 1
        liveness_probe.timeout_seconds: 7
        liveness_probe.period_seconds: 4
        deployment.custom_domain_check_enabled: true
        network.ingress.enable_cors: false
        network.ingress.whitelist_source_range: 0.0.0.0/0
        readiness_probe.initial_delay_seconds: 5
        readiness_probe.timeout_seconds: 7
        network.ingress.proxy_body_size_mb: 1
        liveness_probe.type: TCP
        liveness_probe.success_threshold: 1
        network.ingress.cors_allow_headers: "DNT,Keep-Alive,User-Agent,X-Requested-With,If-Modified-Since,Cache-Control,Content-Type,Range,Authorization"
        hpa.cpu.average_utilization_percent: 1
        readiness_probe.type: TCP
        readiness_probe.failure_threshold: 3
        network.ingress.proxy_buffer_size_kb: 5
        build.timeout_max_sec: 6
        readiness_probe.http_get.path: /
        network.ingress.cors_allow_origin: '*'
        readiness_probe.success_threshold: 9
        network.ingress.cors_allow_methods: "GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS"
        readiness_probe.period_seconds: 2
        liveness_probe.http_get.path: /
      properties:
        deployment.delay_start_time_sec:
          default: 30
          deprecated: true
          description: please use `readiness_probe.initial_delay_seconds` and `liveness_probe.initial_delay_seconds`
            instead
          type: integer
        deployment.custom_domain_check_enabled:
          default: true
          description: disable custom domain check when deploying an application
          type: boolean
        build.timeout_max_sec:
          default: 1800
          type: integer
        network.ingress.proxy_body_size_mb:
          default: 100
          type: integer
        network.ingress.enable_cors:
          default: false
          type: boolean
        network.ingress.cors_allow_origin:
          default: '*'
          type: string
        network.ingress.cors_allow_methods:
          default: "GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, PATCH, OPTIONS"
          type: string
        network.ingress.cors_allow_headers:
          default: "DNT,Keep-Alive,User-Agent,X-Requested-With,If-Modified-Since,Cache-Control,Content-Type,Range,Authorization"
          type: string
        network.ingress.proxy_buffer_size_kb:
          default: 4
          description: header buffer size used while reading response header from
            upstream
          type: integer
        network.ingress.whitelist_source_range:
          default: 0.0.0.0/0
          description: "list of source ranges to allow access to ingress proxy. \n\
            This property can be used to whitelist source IP ranges for ingress proxy.\n\
            The value is a comma separated list of CIDRs, e.g. 10.0.0.0/24,172.10.0.1\n\
            To allow all source ranges, set 0.0.0.0/0.\n"
          type: string
        readiness_probe.type:
          default: TCP
          description: |
            `NONE` disable readiness probe
            `TCP` enable TCP readiness probe
            `HTTP` enable HTTP readiness probe
          enum:
          - NONE
          - TCP
          - HTTP
          type: string
        readiness_probe.http_get.path:
          default: /
          description: HTTP GET path to check status (must returns 2xx E.g "/healtz")
            - only usable with TYPE = HTTP
          type: string
        readiness_probe.initial_delay_seconds:
          default: 30
          description: Delay before liveness probe is initiated
          type: integer
        readiness_probe.period_seconds:
          default: 10
          description: How often to perform the probe
          type: integer
        readiness_probe.timeout_seconds:
          default: 1
          description: When the probe times out
          type: integer
        readiness_probe.success_threshold:
          default: 1
          description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered
            successful after having failed.
          type: integer
        readiness_probe.failure_threshold:
          default: 3
          description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered
            failed after having succeeded.
          type: integer
        liveness_probe.type:
          default: TCP
          description: |
            `NONE` disable liveness probe
            `TCP` enable TCP liveness probe
            `HTTP` enable HTTP liveness probe
          enum:
          - NONE
          - TCP
          - HTTP
          type: string
        liveness_probe.http_get.path:
          default: /
          description: HTTP GET path to check status (must returns 2xx E.g "/healtz")
            - only usable with TYPE = HTTP
          type: string
        liveness_probe.initial_delay_seconds:
          default: 30
          description: Delay before liveness probe is initiated
          type: integer
        liveness_probe.period_seconds:
          default: 10
          description: How often to perform the probe
          type: integer
        liveness_probe.timeout_seconds:
          default: 5
          description: When the probe times out
          type: integer
        liveness_probe.success_threshold:
          default: 1
          description: Minimum consecutive successes for the probe to be considered
            successful after having failed.
          type: integer
        liveness_probe.failure_threshold:
          default: 3
          description: Minimum consecutive failures for the probe to be considered
            failed after having succeeded.
          type: integer
        hpa.cpu.average_utilization_percent:
          default: 60
          description: Percentage value of cpu usage at which point pods should scale
            up.
          type: integer
      type: object
    ApplicationCurrentScale:

        network.ingress.proxy_body_size_mb:
          default: 100
          type: integer

          default: 4

            The value is a comma separated list of CIDRs, e.g. 10.0.0.0/24,172.10.0.1\n\

          default: TCP
          description: |
            `NONE` disable readiness probe
            `TCP` enable TCP readiness probe
            `HTTP` enable HTTP readiness probe

          - NONE
          - TCP
          - HTTP
          type: string
        readiness_probe.http_get.path:

          description: HTTP GET path to check status (must returns 2xx E.g "/healtz")

        readiness_probe.initial_delay_seconds:

    OrganizationWebhookCreateRequest:
      example:
        environment_types_filter:
        - PRODUCTION
        - PRODUCTION
        kind: STANDARD
        target_url: target_url
        target_secret: target_secret
        description: description
        enabled: true
        events:
        - null
        - null
        project_names_filter:
        - project_names_filter
        - project_names_filter
      properties:
        kind:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationWebhookKindEnum'
        target_url:
          description: |
            Set the public HTTP or HTTPS endpoint that will receive the specified events.
            The target URL must starts with `http://` or `https://`
          type: string
        target_secret:
          description: "Make sure you receive a payload to sign the Qovery request\
            \ with your secret.\nQovery will add a HTTP header `Qovery-Signature:\
            \ <Your Secret>` to every webhook requests sent to your target URL.\n"
          type: string
        description:
          type: string
        enabled:
          description: Turn on or off your endpoint.
          type: boolean
        events:
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationWebhookEventEnum'
          type: array
        project_names_filter:
          description: "Specify the project names you want to filter to. \nThis webhook\
            \ will be triggered only if the event is coming from the specified Project\
            \ IDs.\nNotes: 1. Wildcard is accepted E.g. `product*`. 2. Name is case\
            \ insensitive.\n"
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        environment_types_filter:
          description: |
            Specify the environment modes you want to filter to.
            This webhook will be triggered only if the event is coming from an environment with the specified mode.
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/EnvironmentModeEnum'
          type: array
      required:
      - events
      - kind
      - target_url
      type: object
    OrganizationWebhookCreateResponse:
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Base'
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/OrganizationWebhookCreateResponse_allOf'
    OrganizationWebhookEventEnum:
      description: |
        Events to subscribe to and send to the `target_url`.
        - `DEPLOYMENT_STARTED` send an event when a deployment is started and going to be executed
        - `DEPLOYMENT_CANCELLED` send an event when a deployment is cancelled
        - `DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE` send an event when a deployment failed
        - `DEPLOYMENT_SUCCESSFUL` send an event when a deployment is successful
      enum:
      - DEPLOYMENT_STARTED
      - DEPLOYMENT_CANCELLED
      - DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE
      - DEPLOYMENT_SUCCESSFUL
      type: string
    OrganizationWebhookKindEnum:
      description: Define the type of the webhook. `SLACK` is a special webhook type
        to push notifications directly to slack. The `target_url` must be a Slack
        compatible endpoint.
      enum:
      - STANDARD
      - SLACK
      example: STANDARD
      type: string

    ContainerRegistryRequest_config:
      description: "This field is dependent of the container registry kind:\n* `ECR`\
        \ needs in the config: region, access_key_id, secret_access_key\n* `SCALEWAY_CR`\
        \ needs in the config: region, scaleway_access_key, scaleway_secret_key\n\
        * `DOCKER_HUB` needs in the config: username, password\n* `PUBLIC_ECR` needs\
        \ in the config: access_key_id, secret_access_key\n* `DOCR` is not supported\
        \ anymore\n"
      example:
        access_key_id: access_key_id
        password: password
        secret_access_key: secret_access_key
        scaleway_secret_key: scaleway_secret_key
        region: region
        scaleway_access_key: scaleway_access_key
        username: username
      properties:
        access_key_id:
          description: Required if kind is `ECR` or `PUBLIC_ECR`
          type: string
        secret_access_key:
          description: Required if kind is `ECR` or `PUBLIC_ECR`
          type: string
        region:
          description: Required if kind is `ECR` or `SCALEWAY_CR`
          type: string
        scaleway_access_key:
          description: Required if kind is `SCALEWAY_CR`
          type: string
        scaleway_secret_key:
          description: Required if kind is `SCALEWAY_CR`
          type: string
        username:
          description: Required if kind is `DOCKER_HUB`
          type: string
        password:
          description: Required if kind is `DOCKER_HUB`
          type: string
      type: object
    ContainerRegistryResponse_allOf:
      properties:

          type: string
      type: object
    ContainerRequest_allOf:
      properties:
        name:
          description: name is case insensitive
          type: string
        registry_id:
          description: id of the linked registry
          type: string
        image_name:
          description: "The image name pattern differs according to chosen container\
            \ registry provider:  \n* `ECR`: `repository`\n* `SCALEWAY_CR`: `namespace/image`\n\
            * `DOCKER_HUB`: `namespace/image`\n* `PUBLIC_ECR`: `registry_alias/repository`\n"
          type: string
        tag:
          description: tag of the image container
          type: string
        arguments:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        entrypoint:
          description: optional entrypoint when launching container
          type: string
        cpu:
          default: 500
          description: unit is millicores (m). 1000m = 1 cpu
          example: 1250
          type: integer
        memory:
          default: 512
          description: unit is MB. 1024 MB = 1GB
          example: 1024
          type: integer
        min_running_instances:
          default: 1
          description: "Minimum number of instances running. This resource auto-scale\
            \ based on the CPU and Memory consumption.\nNote: 0 means that there is\
            \ no container running.\n"
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        max_running_instances:
          default: 1
          description: "Maximum number of instances running. This resource auto-scale\
            \ based on the CPU and Memory consumption.\nNote: -1 means that there\
            \ is no limit.\n"
          type: integer
      required:
      - image_name
      - name
      - registry_id
      - tag
      type: object
    ContainerResponse_allOf:
      properties:
        environment:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReferenceObject'
        registry:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReferenceObject'
        maximum_cpu:
          description: Maximum cpu that can be allocated to the container based on
            organization cluster configuration. unit is millicores (m). 1000m = 1
            cpu
          example: 16000
          type: integer
        maximum_memory:
          description: Maximum memory that can be allocated to the container based
            on organization cluster configuration. unit is MB. 1024 MB = 1GB
          example: 16384
          type: integer
        name:
          description: name is case insensitive
          type: string
        image_name:
          description: name of the image container
          type: string
        tag:
          description: tag of the image container
          type: string
        arguments:
          items:
            type: string
          type: array
        entrypoint:
          description: optional entrypoint when launching container
          type: string
        cpu:
          description: unit is millicores (m). 1000m = 1 cpu
          example: 1250
          type: integer
        memory:
          description: unit is MB. 1024 MB = 1GB
          example: 1024
          type: integer
        min_running_instances:
          default: 1
          description: "Minimum number of instances running. This resource auto-scale\
            \ based on the CPU and Memory consumption.\nNote: 0 means that there is\
            \ no container running.\n"
          minimum: 0
          type: integer
        max_running_instances:
          default: 1
          description: "Maximum number of instances running. This resource auto-scale\
            \ based on the CPU and Memory consumption.\nNote: -1 means that there\
            \ is no limit.\n"
          type: integer
        auto_preview:
          description: "Specify if the environment preview option is activated or\
